title: Show No Fear
description: I came to college for one reason. To honor my dead mate and parents. They died in a tragic accident and I spent most of the following year wallowing in a pit of pain and self-despair. But now, it's time for me to step the f*ck up and get my life in order. I’ll attend all my classes and live my life the way they would have wanted, and nothing is going to stand in my way. At least that’s what I thought before I met the pack that would change everything... *This book is a reverse harem romance novel and is recommended for readers over the age of eighteen.
author: Tamara White
